name: Super Mario Battle On Itch (From Scratch)
name_original: Super Mario Battle On Itch (From Scratch)
description: If you don't see Lvl 2 OR Lvl 3 scroll down to see updates and see what is really going on... I guess you can call Evil Luigi as Mr. L ========================================= Fight Enemies in this Uprising, some are Foes now, Friends future, some are Foes Disguised as Friends. Whatever it is, Fight your way through until you destroy the enemy, that is until the last update ;) ========================================= If Lagging, use Turbowarp. This has 700+ Assets: https://turbowarp.org/535443125 ========================================= Each Time you click the Green Flag, the Title song will Change. #Mario Controls : P1 = W,A,D to move around, Attacks: Z = Punch X = Twirl C = Hammer I = Also Hammer ------------------------------------------------------------------------- I'm Hoping this will become a new series. Inspired by the legendary Brad-Games , Fan-made series Super Mario Bros Z, and Super Smash Brothers. ================= Updates ================= V1.0.1 Luigi Glitch Fixed V1.0.2 Luigi Appears in the right location V1.0.3 Lvl 2 Can Be played, yet very glitchy. V1.0.4 Title screen updated V1.0.5 Title screen updated V1.0.6 Lvl 2 Complete V1.0.7 Lvl 2 Win Animation Fixed V1.0.8 Lose Animation works V1.0.9 Level Select screen Mini Update V1.1.0 Gravity Falls Soundtrack in Level Select V1.1.1 Next Level appears after Previous Level completed V1.1.2 Lvl 3 Complete V1.1.3 Hilda Credits theme in Level Select ================== Credits ================= - Characters owned by Nintendo and Sega - Music from Nintendo, Sega, Disney, and SMBZ - Sound effects and Sprites (costumes) are not by me, also from here: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/236668005/ - Code 95% by me (Floating animation is the 5%) #WorkInProgress #All #Mario #Marioseries #SMBZ #MarioBattle #Sonic #Shadow #SuperSmashBrothers #Shadoow #Luigi #EvilLuigi #Bowser #Bowsa Silver Sonic: https://www.deviantart.com/baysenahiru427/art/Silver-Sonic-battle-sprites-v1-425... Metal Sonic: https://www.deviantart.com/angrymetal/art/Modgen-Classic-Metal-Sonic-Sprite-Shee...
